project.name: mastra-coding-agent
project.description: A Hono web app with Mastra AI agents, using corticai for context network management. The app exposes context APIs for runtime use, while this CLI manages development context separately.
project.purpose: Testing and developing corticai context network patterns for AI agent workflows

structure.src/: Hono web app with Mastra agents (runtime context at src/data/context.json)

keyFiles: CLAUDE.md - AI assistant instructions and context network workflow
.context-network.md - Quick reference for context CLI usage
conventions: Use corticai subpath imports to avoid MCP auto-init bug
Dev context separate from app runtime context
Check context network before starting work
Store decisions and discoveries as you work
